widget.title: Dialog
widget.p: Dialog is similar to panel, but it has border and title, and you can drag it.

parameters.parameter: The title is displayed in the title bar.
An image to be displayed in the titlebar of the dialog.
A modal dialog grabs all the input to the components behind the dialog from the user.
columns, top, left, bottom, right, and gap parameters are described at panel
name, enabled, visible, tooltip, property, width, height, colspan, rowspan, weightx, weighty, halign, and valign parameters are similar to component

keys.key: Navigate forward, backward inside the dialog
Navigate forward, backward, outside of the non-modal dialog too
